Package eu.infomas.annotation

This library can be used to scan (part of) the class path for annotated classes, methods or instance variables.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Builder Builder offers a fluent API for using AnnotationDetector.
Cursor Cursor offers a "cursor interface" for working with AnnotationDetector.
Reporter Reporter is used to report the detected annotations.
ReporterFunction<T> ReporterFunction is used to report the detected annotations.
 

Class Summary
AnnotationDetector AnnotationDetector reads Java Class Files ("*.class") and reports the found annotations via a simple, developer friendly API.
 

Package eu.infomas.annotation Description

This library can be used to scan (part of) the class path for annotated classes, methods or instance variables.

For documentation, see Github site.

References for Java Class file parsers

  • javassist
  • asm
  • Apache BCEL, considered outdated
  • jCFL, free but not open source
  • Java decompiler, also works on Linux, JAD does not!
